Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Class PlayerListener

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.listeners.PlayerListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class PlayerListener extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener
PlayerListener is a PropertyChangeListener that listen to a Player instance and is associated the RemoteView that represent the player. Message will be forwarded to the remote view, that will broadcast them to all other remote views of the game.
See Also:
  • PropertyChangeListener

  • Method Details

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      Responds to an event that specify what have changed in the player instance that the listener is listening
      Specified by:
      propertyChange in interface PropertyChangeListener
      Parameters:
      evt - A PropertyChangeEvent object describing the event source and the property that has changed.
      See Also:
      • PropertyChangeListener.propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent)

    • onAssistantPlay

      private void onAssistantPlay(Assistant assistant, String playerName)
      Forwards an AssistantPlayed message to the remote view after tha player has played the specified assistant
      Parameters:
      assistant - the assistant that was played
      playerName - the name of the player

    • onDiningRoomChange

      private void onDiningRoomChange(String nickname, RealmType[] students, boolean isInsertion, boolean isFromEntrance)
      Forwards a SchoolDiningRoomUpdate message to the remote view that will inform clients that the player have changed the dining room students by inserting or removing the specified students
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      students - the students that were inserted/removed
      isInsertion - true if students are inserted, otherwise false
      isFromEntrance - true if students come from the entrance, otherwise false

    • onProfessorUpdate

      private void onProfessorUpdate(String nickname, RealmType professor)
      Forwards a ProfessorUpdate message to the remote view that will inform clients that the specified professor has been taken by the player.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player
      professor - the professor that was taken

    • onCoinsUpdate

      private void onCoinsUpdate(String nickname, int oldCoins, int newCoins)
      Forwards a CoinsUpdate message that will inform clients that the coins of the player have changed
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player
      oldCoins - the previous coins of the players
      newCoins - the new coins of the players

    • onMotherNatureMovementIncrement

      private void onMotherNatureMovementIncrement(String nickname, int increment)
      Forwards a MotherNatureMovementIncrement that will inform clients that the player has played character 4, and therefore he can move mother nature by two additional spaces.
      Parameters:
      nickname - the name of the player
      increment - the increment of the mother nature movement
